text: Arau sihamtaka sagarara tirara janabasatira bisaye sodhacona, yetiya sihamte sanibarae simalanghana karaichila, yetiya sanibara palanara dina machabora panita bhahi bhahi sihamtara ocarata ahichila. Kintu yidina sihamte sanibara palana karaa nachila se'idina se'i machabora sihamtara ocarata aha nachila. E'idarae ami sihamtaka paraiksa karaichilo, karana sihamte phachekbi karaichila
